Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Haynesville -- 5 Mills - TC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Haynesville Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5 mills property tax renewal for maintaining and operating the streets and the sewerage system of the Town of Haynesville.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Haynesville, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $51,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the streets and the sewerage system of the Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Wards 2 & 3 Rec. Dist. -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority to levy a 10 year, 5 mills tax renewal for the purpose of maintaining and operating Claiborne Parish Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District's recreational facilities, for purchasing of necessary equipment and paying the cost of maintaining and supervising the recreational facilities.
Race.FullText: Shall Claiborne Parish Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District of the Parish of Claiborne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $240,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's recreational facilities, for purchasing of necessary equipment and paying the cost of maintaining and supervising the recreational facilities?
